item.title: Roblox: Untitled Boxing Game Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Untitled Boxing Game is still very popular among Roblox players, so the developers are working hard to release regular updates. They often add codes to the game when they do so, all of which can be found below. In addition to Untitled Boxing Game codes, Roblox players can find more information about the game here.

Updated July 26, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several codes available right now that offer useful in-game rewards, including spins, cash, and emotes. These bonuses can help you get a small head start or add something new to your collection. It’s worth redeeming them while they’re still active, as they may not stick around for long. More rewards could be added in the future, so check back here regularly for updates.

All Untitled Boxing Game Codes

Codes Checked on July 26, 2025.

All Active Untitled Boxing Game Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Untitled Boxing Game

If players want to get these valuable rewards but don't know how, then this guide will help. Since it is similar to most other Roblox games, the process is simple, so players need not spend too much time on it. Everything that needs to be done is described in the step-by-step instructions below. If a particular code is not redeemable, it is likely because it has expired. In that case, users can try other codes:

  • To get the reward, it is necessary to launch an Untitled Boxing Game .
  • After that, players will find the Codes button on the screen, located on the left in the middle of the screen.
  • Then, a field will appear in which it will be necessary to enter or paste the above codes.
  • And finally, to enter the code, click or tap the Redeem button.

Untitled Boxing Game Tips and Tricks

Below, players will find tips and tricks for Untitled Boxing Game :

  1. Dodge right before the attack.
  2. Use the ultimate strike when breaking the enemy's shield to increase the chances of hitting.
  3. Use the codes mentioned above to get spins and choose a fight style.
  4. Adjust tactics for the specific fight style selected.
  5. Use strong punches to break the shield.

The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Untitled Boxing Game

In case players want to enjoy some other great fighting games on Roblox , they can find a list of the best games, like Untitled Boxing Game, below:

  • Muscle Legends
  • Ninja Legends
  • Rogue Demon
  • Blox Fruits
  • Dragon Blox

About the Untitled Boxing Game Developer

Untitled Boxing Game was developed by a single developer called Drowningsome. But so far, this is the only game he has created, so fans are waiting for new projects.

Roblox
411
8.8 /10
Released
September 1, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

PC, iOS, Xbox One, PS4

item.title: Flex UGC Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Flex UGC is a Roblox experience for buying UGC. You won't find game content here, as it's a marketplace where you can sell, trade, and buy items. Creators usually make packs of items and sell them. If you buy certain items, you can redeem codes and get more freebies. You can find Flex UGC codes in the list below.

Updated July 26, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Two new codes have just been added, offering more free cosmetic items to collect. With dozens of options still active, you can unlock everything from flashy hats and helmets to rare swords, backpacks, and themed companions. These codes focus entirely on customization, giving you new ways to stand out. If you're after more style upgrades, don’t forget to check back often, as this guide gets updated with every drop.

All Flex UGC Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Flex UGC

In many Roblox games, it is easy to redeem codes. The same applies to Flex UGC . When you enter the experience, the option to redeem codes is literally the first thing you will see. Nevertheless, if you need a hint, you can use our guide below, in which we explain how to redeem codes in Flex UGC .

  • Open Roblox and launch Flex UGC .
  • After loading, you will immediately see a window. Click the Redeem a Code button.
  • In the field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Redeem.

Remember that codes in Flex UGC can quickly expire, and it depends on many factors. Item creators may restrict access for some reason or simply run out of copies of the items. Therefore, redeem codes as soon as possible while you can.

How to get More Flex UGC Codes

There are many Roblox codes for Flex UGC and they are easy to find. They're posted on the board to the right of the spawn point, so you can look for them yourself. You can also use this guide too. We update it regularly so that you get the latest codes.

item.title: All Geometry Dash Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Codes For Geometry Dash
  • All Active The Wraith Vault Codes
  • All Active Vault Codes
  • All Active Vault of Secrets Codes
  • All Active Chamber of Time Codes

Geometry Dash launched in August 2013 and quickly earned a cult following that appreciated the rhythm-based game. Jamming to the music of every level, players did their best to complete various Geometry Dash levels and earn diamonds and other prizes to unlock more in-game content, such as avatars and modes. Developed by RobTop Games, Geometry Dash rose quickly in its player base, and has remained prominent among indie gamers, thanks to its simple approach and rise in players across social media platforms. Players can also develop their own levels, challenging fellow Geometry Dash players around the world to take it on for bragging rights.

Updated July 26, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are plenty of active codes available right now, offering a wide range of rewards like icons, shards, Demon Keys, Mana Orbs, and more. Some even unlock special cosmetics and hidden content across different vaults. These extras can be a fun addition, especially if you enjoy customizing your game or collecting rare items. With so many options to redeem, it’s a good time to claim everything that’s available. Be sure to come back, as new codes are often added through game updates.

All Codes For Geometry Dash

Geometry Dash players looking to add some extra icons and colors can gain access to a set of three vaults; The Vault, The Vault of Secrets, and The Chamber of Time, all of which come with their own series of codes and unlockables for this mobile game. Each vault requires certain criteria in order to be unlocked, and until then, players will not be able to access them or use any of the available codes.

These codes will also expire at random intervals, so redeeming them quickly is essential to ensuring access to the available icons and colors. Codes can only be redeemed once per account. Be sure to check back frequently, as codes can be released anytime during the month to introduce new stages, icons, and colors.

Codes Checked on July 26, 2025.

All Active The Wraith Vault Codes

  • thickofit – 1 Mana Orb​ (NEW)
  • skibidi – 1 Mana Orb (NEW)
  • fireinthehole – 1 Fire Shard​ (NEW)
  • robtopisnice – 10 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • bussin – 69 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • wellmet – 5 Diamonds​ (NEW)
  • checksteam – 1 Demon Key​ (NEW)
  • touchgrass – 1 Earth Shard (NEW)
  • wateronthehill – 1 Ice Shard​ (NEW)
  • backondash – Cube 409​ (NEW)
  • key – 1 Demon Key​ (NEW)
  • geometry – Ball 90​ (NEW)
  • citadel – Cube 231​ (NEW)
  • retrospective – Ship 121​ (NEW)
  • iaminpain – 10 Diamonds, 100 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • ruins – Ball 91​ (NEW)
  • spacegauntlet – 20 Diamonds, 1 Demon Key, 2 Metal Shards​ (NEW)
  • cheatcodes – UFO 138 (NEW)
  • backstreetboy – Robot 37​ (NEW)
  • noelelectra – Swing 17​ (NEW)
  • gd2025 – 1 Yellow Key, 25 Diamonds, 25 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • duckstep – Ship 146​ (NEW)
  • skylinept2 – Cube 309​ (NEW)
  • boogie – Wave 92​ (NEW)
  • buttonmasher – UFO 63​ (NEW)
  • gdawards – Cube 485 (NEW)
  • ncsalbum – Jetpack 8​ (NEW)
  • gullible – 1 Mana Orb​ (NEW)
  • putyahandsup – UFO 71​ (NEW)

How to Redeem The Wraith Vault Codes in Geometry Dash

To redeem codes in The Wraith vault, you need to do the following:

  1. Open Geometry Dash and navigate to the main levels screen.​
  2. Scroll to find and select The Tower level.​
  3. Once inside The Tower, tap the icon resembling a face located in the bottom right corner to access The Wraith vault.​
  4. Enter each code into the text box one at a time.​
  5. If the code everything is okay, the corresponding reward will be granted.​

All Active Vault Codes

  • Lenny – Lenny icon
  • Blockbite – UFO
  • Spooky – Shy Guy Icon
  • Neverending – UFO
  • Mule – Ship
  • Ahead – Wave
  • Gandalfpotter – Trail
  • Sparky – Secret Coin
  • Robotop – Robot
  • (enter your in-game username) – Eye
  • 8-16-30-32-46-84 – Illuminati Wave

How to Redeem Vault Codes in Geometry Dash

Players can unlock The Vault in Geometry Dash by simply collecting 10 Silver User Coins . One method to get three Silver User Coins is to complete an Online Feature Level without dying. After unlocking the Vault in Geometry Dash , follow these easy steps to gain access to The Vault and use the aforementioned codes:

  1. Launch the game and open Settings by tapping on the icon at the bottom of the screen.
  2. An open lock icon will appear in the top right corner of the screen, which can be clicked to enter The Vault.
  3. In the box under the ‘ What are you poking around for?’ message, enter each available code, one at a time.
  4. If the code is correctly entered and is still valid, the reward will be distributed.

All Active Vault of Secrets Codes

  • Robotop – Robot
  • Octocube – the Octopus-Shaped Icon
  • Brain Power – the Brain-Shaped Icon
  • Seven – Finn (Adventure Time) Icon
  • thechickenisonfire – Swamp Green color
  • The Challenge – Vault Keepers level
  • Gimmiethecolor – Dark Red color
  • (Your number of stars*) – an Icon (players can find the number of stars on the game's main menu)
  • It’s a Puzzle – an Icon
  • Glubfub – a Secret Coin

How to Redeem Vault of Secrets Codes in Geometry Dash

In order to use the codes listed above, players will need to earn 50 Diamonds in Geometry Dash . This can be done by opening daily chests, completing daily quests, opening Treasure Room chests, opening a weekly Demon chest, and attempting Gauntlet levels. Once players have acquired the appropriate amount of gems, the following steps will need to be taken:

  1. Launch the game and click on the icon in the main menu.
  2. Click on the unlocked icon in the top right corner of the screen, this time choosing to enter The Vault of Secrets.
  3. Enter the desired code in the text box.
  4. If the code is correctly entered and is still valid, the reward will be distributed.

All Active Chamber of Time Codes

  • Volcano – Wave
  • River – Dark Green color
  • Silence – Second default Icon
  • Darkness – Face Icon
  • Hunger – Hungry Icon

How to Redeem Chamber of Time in Geometry Dash

To use the codes listed above, players will need to go to The Vault of Secrets, begin the secret challenge, and beat it to unlock The Chamber of Time in Geometry Dash . Players have to go through the following steps in order to gain access to the codes:

  1. Go to The Vault of Secrets and type " The Challenge" in the code redemption box, without quotations. This will begin a level that costs 200 Diamonds to enter.
  2. Complete the level and then tap on the door icon in the bottom right area of the screen .
  3. Go to the basement to find a locked demon who will ask you to unlock the door. Tap on all three keyholes to activate them.
  4. Go to the "Coming Soon!" section on the game's main selection page and click on the "i" icon to prompt a door and interact with the gatekeeper.
  5. Go back to The Vault of Secrets with 500 Diamonds in hand and press the button to enter an area with a green rope. Click it to open the secret shop and purchase the Master Emblem. Go back to the "Coming Soon!" section and open the door to enter the third chamber. Once inside, enter the code to redeem the prize.
Geometry Dash
7.3 /10
Released
August, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!

Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of Geometry Dash. Push your skills to the limit as you jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.

Simple one touch game play with lots of levels that will keep you entertained for hours!

Rhythm-based Action Platforming! Lots of levels with unique soundtracks! Build and share your own levels using the level editor! Unlock new icons and colors to customize your character!

Fly rockets, flip gravity and much more! Use practice mode to sharpen your skills! Lots of achievements and rewards! Challenge yourself with the near impossible!

Developer(s)
Robert Topala
Platform(s)
Android, iOS, PC
Powered by

item.title: How to Get Devil's Ruin in Destiny 2
item.description:
Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate has shaken up the meta once more, bringing forth some incredible changes and reworks to popular and forgotten Exotic weapons alike. One such Exotic is the Devil's Ruin Sidearm, which boasts immense popularity for those who use Solar builds and want to shred through endgame competition with ease. Below, players will find the exact steps to obtain Devil's Ruin in Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate , enabling them to stay up to date with the current meta and understand how to utilize it effectively in their builds.

How to Get Devil's Ruin in Destiny 2

Players can get Devil's Ruin from the Monument to Lost Lights kiosk, found in the Tower's Courtyard. At the Monument to Lost Lights kiosk, players will want to select the Shadowkeep Exotics tab for the year 3 Exotics, where Devil's Ruin can be purchased for 1 Exotic Cipher and 100,000 Glimmer . If players are lacking the Exotic Cipher to make the purchase, then you can head to Xur in the Tower's Bazaar to grab the free and weekly Xenology Quest, which requires you to complete activities in the Portal with a performance grade B or higher.

Why is Devil's Ruin Good Now in Destiny 2?

Devil's Ruin creates its own gameplay loop, meaning players do not need to rely on their builds, Aspects, and Artifact to make this weapon good. Kills with Devil's Ruin create Firesprites, and with a Firesprite, players can start Pyrogenesis, an alternative fire mode that shoots a Solar laser beam that will scorch on hits, and a kill triggers an Ignition, which basically means players can clear entire rooms of ads with fiery explosions. Devil's Ruin also has a 10% damage buff as a Featured Exotic, which always helps with damage.

This Sidearm also shoots extremely fast, and its power allows for great synergy with Artifact Perks like Fever and Chill, which provides Radiant on rapid precision hits with Solar weapons. That's not all, as players can see further improvements with Radiant Shrapnel, which allows for Solar projectiles to release for damage and Scorch, so long as players are Radiant when dealing damage.

There are tons of synergies that players can experience with Titans, Warlocks, and Hunters, so long as they are using Solar builds with pairing Solar exotic armor, so feel free to grab Devil's Ruin and enjoy this powerhouse.

item.title: Tales of the Shire Release Time
item.description:
If you've ever dreamed of living a peaceful life in the world of 'The Lord of the Rings'' Hobbiton, then Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game is right up your alley. After creating your own little Hobbit and stepping into the village of Bywater, you'll need to help it flourish by trading with townsfolk, tending to your garden, fishing from the ponds and rivers, and preparing homemade meals to share with your fellow Hobbit pals. If you can't wait to get started on your cozy Hobbit-flavored slice-of-life adventure, here's what you need to know about the Tales of the Shire release time.

What Time Does Tales of the Shire Release?

Be Ready for Midnight

Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game will release at 8 AM PT/ 11 AM ET on July 29, 2025 on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, PC, and Nintendo Switch . This is slightly different to some major games that get midnight releases across different time zones so that fans can begin playing as soon as possible. The game's release time in various time zones can be found below.

Time Zone

Tales of the Shire Release Time

LA (Pacific Time)

July 29 at 8 AM

Denver (Mountain Time)

July 29 at 9 AM

Chicago (Central Time)

July 29 at 10 AM

New York (Eastern Time)

July 29 at 11 AM

São Paulo (BRT)

July 29 at 12 PM

London (British Summer Time)

July 29 at 4 PM

Berlin (Central European Time)

July 29 at 5 PM

Kyiv (EEST)

July 29 at 6 PM

Dubai (GST)

July 29 at 7 PM

Bangkok (ICT)

July 29 at 9 PM

Beijing (CST)

July 29 at 11 PM

Seoul (KST)

July 29 at 11 PM

Tokyo (JST)

July 30 at 12 AM

Sydney (AEST)

July 30 at 1 AM

Auckland (NZST)

July 30 at 3 AM

Can You Preload Tales of the Shire?

Some Bad News on the Hobbiton Horizon

Unfortunately, as this is a smaller release it appears as though the game can't be digitally preordered on any platform. As such, players will need to wait until the game officially releases in their time zone (at the time listed above), before they'll be able to purchase and download the game.

If this changes closer to release, I'll update this post with the new information so you can get prepared for your venture into the village of Bywater and live out your best Hobbit life. Unfortunately, this time there's no head start if you're downloading the game as opposed to buying the physical edition of Tales of the Shire .

You might want to check that your PC specifications meet Tales of the Shire's requirements in the meantime, as it's quite demanding for a cozy game.
